title: Ending Sentences with Punctuation
subject: Grammar
objective: Students will learn to end sentences with periods, question marks, or exclamation points.

lessonFlow.content: Every sentence needs the right punctuation at the end. Letâ€™s find out which one to use!

rules.rule: Use a period for a regular sentence.
Use a question mark when you ask something.
Use an exclamation mark to show excitement.

activities.question: Which punctuation ends a question?
activities.explanation: Questions end with a question mark.

lessonFlow.instruction: Write one sentence with a question mark and one with an exclamation mark.
